member.summary: Derived class has determined the best selection. Base class will not attempt to select another item.

member.summary: Derived class could not determine the right selection and it is left to the base class to restore the previous selection if there was one.

member.name: M:CoreNodeModels.DSDropDownBase.PopulateItemsCore(System.String)
member.summary: Call this method to allow derived classes to populate the drop down list items. An existing selection is provided as an argument so that it can be retained after drop down items are regenerated.
member.param: Item text of an existing selected drop down item, or string.Empty if there is no existing selection.

member.summary: Callback when selection button is clicked. Calls the selection action, and stores the ElementId(s) of the selected objects.

member.name: M:CoreNodeModels.SelectionBase`2.GetModelObjectFromIdentifer(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an object in the model from a string identifier.
member.returns: The object or null if the object cannot be found.

member.name: M:CoreNodeModels.SelectionBase`2.GetIdentifierFromModelObject(`0)
member.summary: Returns an object's unique identifier.
member.returns: A unique identifier or null if no unique identifier can be derived.

member.name: P:CoreNodeModels.Watch.HasRunOnce
member.summary: Has the Watch node been run once? If not, the CachedValue is technically not accurate.

member.name: T:CoreNodeModels.ToStringNodeBase
